    #include<iostream>
    #include<cstdio>
    # include<cstring>
    using namespace std;

    int main()
    {
        int t;
        char text[20],pat[20];

        scanf("%d",&t);

        while(t--)
            {
                scanf("%s%s",&text,&pat);

                if(strstr(text,pat) == NULL)
                printf("%d\n",0);
                else
                printf("%d\n",1);
        }
        return 0;
    }
